problem_text: Use a speech-to-text AI tool to transcribe a short message. How accurate was it?
solution_text: Students should compare original message vs. transcript, noting word errors, tone loss, or accent misreads.

problem_text: Imagine a facial recognition API misidentifies someone. What are the consequences — and who's responsible?
solution_text: Answers may explore surveillance, discrimination, accountability gaps, and platform disclaimers.

problem_text: Map out every service or API a delivery app (like Uber Eats or DoorDash) depends on. Who controls what?
solution_text: Students should include maps, payments, traffic prediction, routing, ads, notifications — all outsourced tools.

problem_text: Design a minimal, ethical alternative to an AI service you tried. What does it gain — and what does it lose?
solution_text: Examples: a human transcription network, manual content moderation, in-house data annotation. Trade-offs in speed, cost, ethics.
